3.all: Picture yourself as the ultimate fertility guru, the wizard of abundance! Your superpower is dreaming up epic projects and making them a reality, while also being the family architect and a champion for those around you. You’ve got the golden touch when it comes to creating wealth and beauty in the world, and you’re a natural-born teacher, showing others how to weave magic into their own lives. Helping others isn’t just something you do – it’s in your DNA, providing opportunities for growth and enrichment to many. You’re a creative powerhouse, leading people with your visionary ideas and stepping up to take responsibility for them. Embrace the art of owning not just your life but also the lives you touch. Recognize that your work is meant to yield results, and find joy in every aspect of life, valuing all the wonderful people who surround you.
3.short: Picture yourself as the ultimate fertility guru, the wizard of abundance! Your superpower is dreaming up epic projects and making them a reality, while also being the family architect and a champion for those around you.

4.all: Imagine yourself as the guardian of your realm, the wise protector. You're a master at wearing many hats: family person, worker bee, creator. Your mission? Bring your projects to life, see them through to the end, and be the epitome of reliability. Teach others how to build from scratch, give them the confidence for tomorrow, and be the steadfast pillar in your family.
4.short: Imagine yourself as the guardian of your realm, the wise protector. You're a master at wearing many hats: family person, worker bee, creator.

5.all: You're the professor and social glue of your tribe! Your energy flourishes when you're imparting knowledge and rallying people around a common cause. Keep chasing new wisdom, explore the globe, and build meaningful connections. Don't be a knowledge hoarder – spread your brilliance far and wide!
5.short: You're the professor and social glue of your tribe! Your energy flourishes when you're imparting knowledge and rallying people around a common cause.

6.all: You're the maestro of harmony, love, and resoluteness. Picture yourself as a creator of beauty and a generator of good vibes. Your mission? Transform your surroundings into a haven of warmth and friendliness, making every space feel like home. You’re not just about organizing events; you’re the life of the party, the one who brings fun and excitement into every day. Follow your heart in all you do, and build deep, meaningful connections with people who truly resonate with you. Your energy is like a magnet, drawing people together and fostering a sense of belonging and joy. You have the innate ability to create cozy atmospheres where everyone feels valued and loved. Your presence alone can uplift spirits and make any gathering feel special. Embrace your role as the heart of your community, spreading love and joy wherever you go.
6.short: You're the maestro of harmony, love, and resoluteness. Picture yourself as a creator of beauty and a generator of good vibes.

7.all: You're a natural-born coach and the unstoppable engine of progress in any environment you find yourself in. Your unique ability to see the potential in others allows you to not only set and achieve your own goals but also to guide and motivate those around you to reach new heights. You have an innate talent for identifying the strengths and weaknesses in people, and you use this insight to help them chart a course toward success.
7.short: You're a natural-born coach and the unstoppable engine of progress in any environment you find yourself in.

8.all: Imagine yourself as the ultimate motivator and the engine of progress. Your energy is all about movement, leadership, and purpose. You're a born coach, someone who not only sets goals but also helps others see and achieve theirs. Your mission? To identify clear objectives, both for yourself and for those around you, and to inspire everyone to reach for the stars. You have a unique talent for guiding people, helping them stay focused and driven. Your vision is not limited to your own success; you’re dedicated to helping others realize their potential and dreams. Your enthusiasm is infectious, making people want to follow your lead and strive for excellence. Embrace your role as a leader and motivator, using your energy to drive progress and inspire greatness in everyone you meet. Whether it's in personal development, career ambitions, or community projects, your ability to see the bigger picture and rally others toward common goals makes you a pivotal force for positive change.
8.short: Imagine yourself as the ultimate motivator and the engine of progress. Your energy is all about movement, leadership, and purpose.

9.all: Imagine yourself as the sage of life's wisdom and experiences. Your mission is to live every moment fully, diving deep into the essence of life in all its forms. Don't shy away from self-education, explore new fields of knowledge, connect with wise individuals, and impart your wisdom. Your strength lies in your ability to inspire those around you with your example and knowledge, enriching their inner worlds.
